title: BYC Podcast #216: The Deep Dive Eastside Van Dyk Episode
content:
The Godfather heads east to join Off White Thunder and Kevvy on the Miramar Peninsula for a syrah and yarns vaguely related to cricket. The boys yak crap about basketball, AJ Whetton, Lance Hamilton, Greer Robson and Steve Smith. OWT decides that Brad Haddin is a terrible role model. Kev is lured into calling out Irene Van Dyke in her boxing match quest. 
 
Emails From Around the World land from Reg (who obliterates Kev’s Bring Back Brownlie campaign with data), Muzz on Hunt County kit, and Geoff of Elstow with a season wrap from the eighth richest nunnery in England. 
 
Listen in below or on  iTunes  or on  gpodder.net  if you’re a non-Appler. 
 
Email the chaps with your observations, nonsense, questions & thoughts here:   byc@beigebrigade.co.nz 
 
THE PODDIE
